00044 class KX_SoftBodyDeformer : public RAS_Deformer
00045 {
00046     class RAS_MeshObject*           m_pMeshObject;
00047     class BL_DeformableGameObject*  m_gameobj;
00048 
00049 public:
00050     KX_SoftBodyDeformer(RAS_MeshObject* pMeshObject,BL_DeformableGameObject* gameobj)
00051         :m_pMeshObject(pMeshObject),
00052         m_gameobj(gameobj)
00053     {
00054         //printf("KX_SoftBodyDeformer\n");
00055     };
00056 
00057     virtual ~KX_SoftBodyDeformer()
00058     {
00059         //printf("~KX_SoftBodyDeformer\n");
00060     };
00061     virtual void Relink(CTR_Map<class CTR_HashedPtr, void*>*map);
00062     virtual bool Apply(class RAS_IPolyMaterial *polymat);
00063     virtual bool Update(void)
00064     {
00065         //printf("update\n");
00066         m_bDynamic = true;
00067         return true;//??
00068     }
00069     virtual bool UpdateBuckets(void)
00070     {
00071         // this is to update the mesh slots outside the rasterizer, 
00072         // no need to do it for this deformer, it's done in any case in Apply()
00073         return false;
00074     }
00075 
00076     virtual RAS_Deformer *GetReplica()
00077     {
00078         KX_SoftBodyDeformer* deformer = new KX_SoftBodyDeformer(*this);
00079         deformer->ProcessReplica();
00080         return deformer;
00081     }
00082     virtual void ProcessReplica()
00083     {
00084         // we have two pointers to deal with but we cannot do it now, will be done in Relink
00085         m_bDynamic = false;
00086     }
00087     virtual bool SkipVertexTransform()
00088     {
00089         return true;
00090     }
00091 
00092 protected:
00093     //class RAS_MeshObject  *m_pMesh;
00094
